title: Can not find Microsft Activesync on pixes 3a android 11
content:
Hi,

Our employee replace a phone ( same model ) but adroid has been updated to version 11. Our company app relies on adding our office365 calendar via Microsft ActiveSync service. However we can't see this option in add account. Are we doing something wrong ? Previously ActiveSync was here as an option.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
